messages.generationTakes: Generation takes 3-5 minutes, do not refresh the page
messages.clickToUpload: Click to upload image or drag it here

hero.title: Transform any image into a distinctive 3D design
hero.subtitle: Use artificial intelligence to transform your images into creative 3D designs with transparent backgrounds, perfect for designers and creators

uploadSection.title: Upload Image
uploadSection.uploadText: Click to upload image or drag it here

promptSection.title: Transformation Description
promptSection.placeholder: Describe how you want to transform your image...
promptSection.defaultPrompt: Transform the uploaded image into a collectible toy figure that could be included as a gift with a McDonald's burger meal. Stylize the character as a small, plastic figurine placed on a simple display base. Include a realistic McDonald's burger and its branded packaging in the background to give the impression of a Happy Meal toy promotion. Use soft lighting and a clean background, keeping the colors vibrant and playful.

gallery.title: My Gallery
gallery.subtitle: All designs you created using artificial intelligence

emptyState.noDesignsText: Start creating your first designs using artificial intelligence

login.title: Welcome Back

login.heroTitle: Transform your idea into a distinctive 3D visual design using artificial intelligence
login.heroSubtitle: Completely free for designers and creators. Upload your image and get a 3D design with transparent background in minutes
